1.「刻印を刻まれし者よ……。: You who are engraved with the mark...

2.「我が主に 捧げられし者よ。| 貴様の命……もらい受けに来た！: You who are marked by our Lord. We have|come... to take your life!

3.ブラッドメイジたちとの戦いに|勝利した <cs_pchero>は|元の宝箱の前に: Having won the battle against the Blood Mages,|<cs_pchero> returned to the treasure|chest.

4.しかし 突然 めまいに おそわれ|意識が 遠くなっていく……。: However, they were suddenly struck by|dizziness and lost consciousness...

5.「我の定めし 供物よ…… | 我がもとへ 来るがよい……。: Come, my chosen offering...|Come to me...

7.<cs_pchero>は 気を取り直して|アクターのカギを使って 宝箱を開けた。: <cs_pchero> pulled themselves together|and used the Actor's Key to open the treasure|chest.

8.宝箱の中には|極意書の最終巻が 入っていた。: Inside the treasure chest contained the|Creed Final Volume.

11.「今 キミの存在が こっちに近づいてるおかげで| こうして 出てくることができた: Now that your presence is closer, I'm able to|pop up like this. What I mean is, your life's|in danger, but...

12.「あんまり自覚なし？ ノンキなもんだよなー。| まっ その方がキミらしくて 面白: Not really aware of what's going on, huh? Just|as nonchalant as ever. Well, that's more like|you, anyways. We have this chance to talk.

13.「キミは覚えてる？ ボクの果たせなかった夢を。| それは アストルティア最大の役: Don't tell me ya don't remember? My|unfulfilled dream? To win the World Goofball|Grand Prix, the biggest in Astoltia!

14.「そのためにも ボクは| 伝説の『アクター極意書全５巻』を手に入れて| 実力を: To do that, I needed to get my hands on the|legendary five volumes of "Actor's Creed" and|hone my skills.

15.「そしたら あのピリッポが先に| 極意書を全巻集めて 読んじゃった！| 前とは: That's when that Pirippo guy went ahead and|read all of those books! He's gotten a lot|more clever than he was before.

16.「それを見ていて| ボクは…… ボクは……！: When I saw that, I... I...!!

18.「ボクはかつて ピリッポとコンビを組んでいた。| でも アイツは チャンピオンの: I used to work with him. But he always|compared himself to me, the champion at the|time...

19.「自分のいいところを 伸ばそうとしなかった。| だから コンビを解消したんだよ。: I didn't focus on developing my own strengths.|That's why our little duo broke up. I wanted|people to see Pirippo as his own person.

20.「ありがとよ。これからも オレは| ありのままに かむぜ！| ドリームズ かむ: Thanks a bunch! I'll keep truckin' as I am.|Your dreams'll come true!!

21.「あっはっは！ ケッサク！| こんな天然モノ どこ探してもいないって。| それだ: Ahaha! What a masterpiece! You won't find a|natural like him anywhere else. That's your|gist, Pirippo!

22.「……ボクも そんな極意に| たどり着いてみたかった。| でも もう満足だ。: I wish I could've done the same... but it|doesn't matter now. I'm satisfied.

23.「ボクの夢は ボクも知らないうちに| ピリッポが継いでくれてたんだって| よーく: I now realize that Pirippo took over my dream|without me even knowing it!

24.「ワールド演芸グランプリ優勝の夢は| どうやら アイツが 果たしてくれそうだ。|: Looks like he'll be able to fulfill his dream|of winning the World Goofball Grand Prix...|One day, for sure...

25.「……ムフッ。| やっぱり 夢を語っちゃうとか| そういうのって ちょっと テレ: Ahem... Sorry about that. Guess I'm a bit|nervous when I talk about my own dreams.

26.「さーてと！ そろそろ ボクは行くよ。| 今度こそ 心残りはない！| 迷うことな: Welp! I better get goin', then. And with no|regrets this time! No second thoughts!

27.「サラバだ <pc>！| キミの幸せを ずっと祈ってる。| 笑いと涙にあふれた: See ya, <pc>! I'll always be|wishing for your life to be filled with|happiness, laughter, and tears!

29.「今 キミの存在が こっちに近づいてるおかげで| こうして 出てくることができた: Your presence is pretty close to me right now|so I'm able to just pop up like this. Your|life IS in danger, but...

30.「あんまり自覚なし？ ノンキなもんよねー。| まっ その方がキミらしくて 面白い: Not sure what's going on? You sure are|carefree, aren'tcha? Well, that's more like|you anyways. Gives us a chance to talk.

31.「覚えてる？ アタシの果たせなかった夢。| それは アストルティア最大の役者の祭: You remember, right? My unfulfilled dream?|I wanted to win the World Goofball Grand Prix,|the biggest in all of Astoltia!

32.「そのためにも アタシは| 伝説の『アクター極意書全５巻』を手に入れて| 実力を: To do that, I had to find those legendary|five volumes of "Actor's Creed" and hone my|skills.

33.「そしたら あのピリッポが先に| 極意書を全巻集めて 読んじゃった！| 前とは: But then Pirippo took it upon himself to get|all of the books and read them! I gotta say,|he's improved quite a lot.

34.「それを見ていて| アタシは…… アタシはね……！: When I saw that, I was... I was...!

36.「アタシは昔 ピリッポとコンビを組んでたの。| でも アイツは チャンピオンのア: Me and him used to work together. But he|always compared himself to me, the champ|at the time...

37.「自分のいいところを 伸ばそうとしなかった。| だから コンビを解消したのよ。|: He didn't want to develop his strengths.|That's why I broke it off. I wanted him to see|Pirippo as he really is.

38.「ありがとよ。これからも オレは| ありのままに かむぜ！| ドリームズ かむ: Thanks a lot. I'm gonna keep biting just the|way I like it! Dreams, bite true!

39.「あっはっは！ やだ ケッサク！| こんな天然モノ どこ探してもいないって。|: Ha-ha-ha! Oh, Kessak! You can't find a natural|like him anywhere. That's it, Pirippo, your|secret!

40.「……アタシも そんな極意に| たどり着いてみたかったな。| でもね もう満足し: I wish I could have reached that kind of|mastery. But you know what, I'm satisfied now.

41.「アタシの夢は アタシも知らないうちに| ピリッポが継いでくれてたんだって| よ: I knew that Pirippo had taken over my dream|without me even knowing it!

42.「ワールド演芸グランプリ優勝の夢は| どうやら アイツが 果たしてくれそうね。|: It looks like she's going to fulfill her dream|of winning the World Performing Arts Grand|Prix. I'm sure one day...

43.「……なーんて<heart>| キャー 言っちゃった！ 言っちゃった！| 夢とか: ...And so on<heart> Eek I said it! I|said it! I'm so embarrassed to talk about my|dreams!

44.「さーてと！ そろそろ アタシは行こっかな。| 今度こそ 心残りはないもんね！|: Well, well! I think it's time for me to go.|This time I won't have any regrets! I can go|that way without hesitation.

45.「じゃあねー もうひとりの <pc>。| キミの幸せを ずーっと祈ってるよ。|: Bye, the other <pc>. I'll be praying|for your happiness all the way. I wish you a|wonderful life full of laughter and tears!

46.「キミには ずいぶん 世話になっちゃったね。| これからは ボクのことは 気にせ: You have been a great help to me. From now on,|don't worry about me and go your own way.

47.「これは ボクからの ほんの気持ちだ。| いつか きっと 何かの役に立つはずだか: This is just a thought from me. I'm sure it|will be useful for something someday, so don't|forget to take it without Enryo.

49.「キミには ずいぶん お世話になっちゃった。| これからは アタシのことは 気に: You have been a great help to me. From now on,|don't worry about me and go your own way.

50.「これは アタシからの ほんの気持ち。| いつか きっと 何かの役に立つはずだか: This is just a small token from me. I'm sure|it will be useful for something someday, so|don't forget to keep it.
